He is Caligura, also known as the "Count Dragul". One of the
caporegime, or captains, from a rival branch in The Family.
You have no idea what he is doing here though.
"We are now finally going to have a little one-to-one."
"What do I want!? Rich. Very rich."
"You're one of Accardo's fucking soldiers! I recognized your ugly
ass mutt face the moment you came walking from the train cabin!"
"Didn't have balls to act right there in front of all the people?"
"What's the matter!? I need to beat some sense to you before you
open that little mouth of yours!?"
"You're one of Accardo's fucking soldiers! I recognized your ugly
ass mutt face the moment you came walking from the train cabin!"
"One wrong move, one wrong word and you're a goner!"
"No one sent me here, I'm not doing Family errands here!"
"Why would someone send me after you?"
"I don't know what you are talking about..."
"No one sent me here, I'm not doing Family errands here!"
"The world just happens to be small enough for us to run into
each other out here in the middle of - goddamn - nowhere!?"
"I don't know what to say, that's the truth..."
"Nothing swipes a smile off someone's face like a lead pipe!"
"I don't know what to say, that's the truth..."
"I don't know what's your plan here, but this ain't it chief."
"This will only get your skull smashed in."
"Well you got shit to lose at this point!"
"I abandoned The Family. I'm running away from Vatican."
"I abandoned The Family. I'm running away from Vatican."
Caligura is measuring your words and looking intensely in your
\c[1]"You don't say...? Is this guy shitting me?"\c[0]
"A fucking pussy. That's what you are!"

"No reason. Just took the first train that departed Vatican."
"No reason. Just took the first train that departed Vatican."
"You really are as dim-witted as you look."
"You think I'd believe that for a second!?"
"Fine, you got me. Accardo sent me."
"Now what am I supposed to do with you?"
"I'll be keeping my eye on you."
"You better remember where your loyalties lie. I spared your ass
"That doesn't happen often. Consider yourself among the lucky ones."
"Fine, you got me. Accardo sent me."
Caligura is trying to measure the honesty of your words...
